name: dunajs
description: A simple set of javascript controls

scripts.examples: npm run cls && cp -rf examples/*.* -t dist
scripts.dev: npm run examples && npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.prod: npm run cls && rollup --config scripts/config.js --environment BUILD:production
scripts.link: cp -rf package.json -t dist && cd dist && npm link
scripts.dist: cp -rf package.json README.md -t dist && cd dist && npm publish

author: Alexandre Toledo Perez <alexandretperez@gmail.com>
